Mexican Military Band
Riderique.
Wehrmann, Henri, 1827-1905
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Originally for band; arranged for piano.
"Played at the World's Exposition at New Orleans by the celebrated Mexican Military Band"--Series title page.
Title page illustration: Flags of Mexico and the United States.
At head of caption: "To Mr. et Mme. N. Landry de la Nouvelle Orleans."
Advertisement on p. [8]: "The first and largest publisher of Mexican music in the United States, Junius Hart," with list of publications.
